page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: I get out of bed at 7.45 each morning. Then I have my breakfast which is usually toast, cereals and a cup of tea. After breakfast I get ready and set for school. I catch the No 50 Whitegate bus. My fare is 13p.(half fare). As I get off the bus I go to the corner shop to buy a packet of crisps or some sweets. Then I go to school which starts at 8.55. We assemble in the hall after registration for hymns and prayers. Then we go to class for Maths. At 10.30 we have playtime. I play Tig, a game of chasing with the other boys and girls. Playtime finishes at 10.45. We do English until 12.00, dinner time when I have a main meal and a dessert. In the afternoon we have General Studies until 3.40, home time. When I get home I watch TV until tea. After tea I play out until 8.30. Then I have supper and go to bed.
